short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-based web-extension - helps autistic individuals explain meanings of phrases and compose replies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding the perfect answer to ritualistic questions can be tough. Let our tool assist you.

Features:
üîç Text clarifier: Explains hidden meanings of phrases 
‚úçÔ∏è Reply assistant: Provides nice and polite replies

Text clarifier:
The Text Clarifier is a valuable tool designed to help you decipher hidden meanings and nuances in written communication. It's especially useful when you want to understand the underlying messages, subtext, or implied sentiments within a text.

Reply assistant:
This feature aids in crafting responses for those polite small talk moments and dialogue initiations and conclusions. ‚àû Tailored for the autistic community, we aim to help in these often meaningless interactions. Our goal isn't to change your authentic voice or make you imitate others, but to offer a hand during routine exchanges.

Use Autentik AI Text Helper for a gentle nudge during these moments! üí¨‚ù§Ô∏è

How to use the extension:
1. Select some text on the web-page: in email,  "Whatsapp for web", "Reddit", or on some other resource. 
2. Open the Extention
3. Press "Make it clear" to clarify the text, Press "Compose reply" to get an option for potential reply.

Settings:
To open settings, click on the three lines in the top right corner. Here you can:
- Translate the interface to different languages
- Choose whilte ‚¨ú, blue üü¶ or black ‚¨õÔ∏è color scheme
- Make the Popup bigger or smaller

The solution is powered by Anthropic. 

Users should not highlight or send any personal data while interacting with this service.
